Month of Rajab, when God's forgiveness is near
  
The most precious act available to human beings during the month of Rajab is asking for God's forgiveness. God's forgiveness is the greatest blessing that Almighty God bestows on a person in this world and in the hereafter.

The woman is a flower in the home

According to a narration, the Prophet (pbuh) stated, “A woman is a flower in the home, and she isn’t a servant." A qahramanah [in Arabic] refers to someone who bears the burdens of work. Rayhanah means a flower [in Arabic].

6 اگست 1945: انسانیت کی تاریخ کا سیاہ ترین دن

اس انیمیشن کے ذریعے تصور کریں کہ جب ہیروشیما اور ناگاساکی پر ایٹم بم گرائے گئے تو وہاں کے معصوم انسانوں پر کیا بیتی ہوگی؟
